QuestData.Title: Noble Responsibilities
QuestData.Description: From the state of this body, I would say a beast with formidable claws or fangs ravaged this camp. You say the trail leads westward? This camp usually houses more than one of Alanna's hunters. I wonder if they are tracking the beast down as well.$b$bHurry it up! I don't want to spend the day waiting around. Track our dangerous quarry!
QuestData.LogDescription: Track and kill the murdering monster.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for dealing with the threat. I'll see that the men who died out there have a proper send off.
